channel.title: How To Put Your Server On A VPS!
channel.description: Ok, I need to know how to put my RSPS on a VPS, so it can be 24/7, i have the money and stuff, but i need a site and how to put it on there, because i dont wanna pay $ and then not be able to use it.

item.title: How To Put Your Server On A VPS!
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Upload your server to a site such as uppit, download it on the Virtual private server, then use the delete link it gives you to delete it off the upload site. Login to the no-ip website, and change your IP address that it will be hosted from, to the IP of your Virtual private server.

Read full topic
item.source: How To Put Your Server On A VPS!
